title: Peaceful by-elections in Punjab to herald era of development, prosperity: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb said on Sunday that peaceful election process has been completed in 20 constituencies of Punjab, which would herald development, prosperity and reduction in inflation in the country.
Taking a dig at the previous government of the PTI, in a tweet, she said no staff of the Election Commission was kidnapped, no vote bag were stolen, no ballot boxes were snatched.
اللہ کا شکر ہے کہ نہ الیکشن کمشن کا عملہ اغوا ہوا، ووٹ کا کوئی تھیلہ چوری ہوا،نہ ڈبے اٹھائے گئے الحمدللہ کسی جان کا نقصان ہوااور نہ ہی پنجاب کی ایڈمنسٹریشن کا فون بند ہوا. پنجاب کے 20 حلقوں میں پرامن انتخابی عمل مکمل ہوا جو ملک میں ترقی،خوش حالی اور مہنگائی میں کمی کی نوید ہوگا
She said fortunately there was no loss of life and the phone of the Punjab administration was not disconnected (like Daska by-elections during PTI rule).
